column4: question: how would i encrypt private messages in ubuntu irc chat, like you can in windows/mirc chat with fish. Is there a fish plugin for ubuntu/irc chat, i googled, but not having much luck
to protect against local sniffing, or do you want end-to-end encryption?
i guess a better question would be what is the best irc chat client for ubuntu
just want to keep my private conversations private in chat
